result.purpose: Responsible for providing services related to decentralized exchange operations, including token handling, route fetching, and cross-chain swaps.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file represents a specific service related to decentralized exchange functionalities.

internal/domains/dex/services/provider/k.purpose: Defines the Katana service for handling token operations in a decentralized exchange context.
Implements the KyberSwap provider for a decentralized exchange service.

internal/domains/dex/services/provider/p.purpose: Defines a provider service for decentralized exchange (DEX) operations including route fetching and fee calculations.

internal/domains/dex/services/provider/r.purpose: Implements a relay service for cross-chain swaps in a decentralized exchange.
